## SmartContract.computeAddress() method

Computes the address of a Smart Contract. The address is computed deterministically, from the address of the owner and the nonce of the deployment transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static computeAddress(owner: IAddress, nonce: INonce): IAddress;
```

## Parameters

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

owner


</td><td>

[IAddress](sdk-core.iaddress.md)


</td><td>

The owner of the Smart Contract


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

nonce


</td><td>

[INonce](sdk-core.inonce.md)


</td><td>

The owner nonce used for the deployment transaction


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[IAddress](sdk-core.iaddress.md)
